about_the_game:
Gain access to a new level of VR fitness with PowerBeatsVR’s "Song Pack 3"! Immerse yourself in 12 dynamic brand-new songs, available in beginner, advanced, and expert levels, catering to fitness enthusiasts of all skill levels.

Feel the raw energy of Alaina Cross’s rock anthems and get lost in the rhythmic world of Jon Worthy. Let 'Ready and Go' by Marscott be the anthem of your sporting success, and find your rhythm with 'Closer' by The Runaway Club. Each track in this collection is more than just music – it's a motivational force that will push you through every punch, every squat, and every drop of sweat. "Song Pack 3" is here to dispel the monotony of workouts, validate your efforts, and escalate your VR fitness experience to thrilling new heights.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later, 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 29
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into 12 exhilarating new tracks, each with three difficulty levels suitable for all fitness levels. Each song is a new challenge, a new adventure, ready to challenge every muscle in your body. Feel the rhythm, embrace the energy, and get closer to your fitness goal with every new beat!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Thai
*languages with full audio support
